sub_title: Senior Financial Analyst - Finance Solutions PMO at Medtronic
summary: For over 5 years now, I am working within the Global Finance Organization of Medtronic, based in Heerlen. After starting my career for 2,5 years in the Intercompany Inventory Purchasing (ICIP) team from the EMEA region, I am now working in the Finance Solutions PMO team. My team is responsible for the Finance part on various types of strategic projects such as Mergers & Acquisitions, Liquidations, ERP Implementations, business model innovations, and Channel Management initiatives.
